alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 1:55PM MST until August 09 at 2:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Yavapai County southeast of Yarnell in central Arizona... * Until 245 PM MST. * At 153 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located southeast of Yarnell, near Wagoner, or 16 miles northeast of Wickenburg, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts, up to penny size hail, and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Walnut Grove, Wagoner, Yarnell, and Peeples Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
